name: Squirrel Sphere
detailed_description:
[ RECREATIONAL RODENT ROLLING ]

  • Roll thru 60 levels across 6 worlds, get to the goal while collecting the acorns
  • Use balloons, springs, pinball flippers, cannons & other fun mechanics to get across the levels
  • Have a blast with friends in split-screen multiplayer!
  • Tight camera & controls allow precise trajectory & control over your balled squirrel
  • Use a Controller, Keyboard & Mouse, or just keyboard to play

[ MULTIPLAYER SPLIT SCREEN ]

Roll your balls with up to 3 friends (4 total). Work together to beat the main game & compete for best scores. Multiplayer supports main levels, boss fights & Squirrel Smash minigame.

[ STORY ]

Shadowtail has trapped all the squirrels inside balls, travel across the land to reach his hideout, defeat him, & free the squirrels!

[ 6 Unique Worlds ]

Nut-Tree Forest - The native home of the Squirrels, an comfy introduction to the game
Arctic Mountain - Snowy Hills under the glimmering Northern lights, pop some balloons and enjoy the calm winter feel
Haunted Woods - The sanctuary to ghosts and traps galore, learn to use springs to stay alive
Squirrel City - The bustling hub of planet Squirreltopia, take a ride on cars and scale skyscrapers, but watch your step
Cosmic Galaxy - The dark corners of space where you will need to use everything you've learned so far and more
??? - ?????

[ CUSTOMIZE YOUR SQUIRREL & DECORATE YOUR BALLS ]

  • Change Sphere color, details (such as a cage or spikes), neon glow, & trails.
  • Personalize your squirrel with accessories like sunglasses, hats & different colors
  • Unlock new custom parts for your squirrel by finding & collecting Squirrel Coins

[ MINIGAME MADNESS ]

Squirrel Sphere features many unique minigames to play in addition to the main game.
Find the hidden retro game carts in the main game to unlock them!
  • Squirrel Smash - Break all the glass/objects, spans across many levels such as graveyard, Xmas tree, & museum
  • Squirrel Bowling - Knock over the pins in different lanes, you get one shot
  • Sqiball- Roll into a Skiball table, try to earn the most points, you get 3 balls
  • Squirrel Pinball - Play on a traditional Pinball machine
  • Squirrel Basketball - Play hoops, try to get a squirrel swish!

[ DANGEROUS BOSS FIGHTS ]

Shadowtail has brought to life monsters & built machines to stop you on your adventure. Each World is guarded by a fierce boss. You'll need to figure out their weak spot & attack it for massive damage...

[ REPLAYABILTY ]

  • Each level & minigame keeps track of your best score/time
  • Try to find all the secrets & collectables!
  • Unlock cheats & have some extra fun!

[ THANK YOU FOR LOOKING! Try Squirrel Sphere today!]
